definition: to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]

sentences.english: The terms under which China Sonangol buys oil from Angola have never been made public.
sentences.chinese: 中国和安中石油签订的石油采购条款从未被曝光。

sentences.english: We want to buy Knitwear and Knitted Fabrics, Audio and Video Products.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购针织物，织物，声音和录象机产品。

sentences.english: Pepper, Chilli, Coriander Leaf, Cloves , Herbal Spices (Organic.
sentences.chinese: 采购产品胡椒粉，智利，芫荽叶，丁香，草药的药料。

sentences.english: Assists in purchase of required furniture and IT equipment and manages all warranties.
sentences.chinese: 采购必要的家具和IT设备并且管理好质保期。

sentences.english: They have performed really, really well, ' according to buying director Holli Rogers.
sentences.chinese: 该网站采购主管罗杰斯说，灯笼裤卖的真的非常好。

sentences.english: Paul said to admit, zhaotian removed his purchasing position.
sentences.chinese: 保言认错，兆天撤去他的采购职务。

sentences.english: China typically buys a fifth of the U.S. crop.
sentences.chinese: 中国大约采购美国总产量的五分之一。

sentences.english: Xiaoyan YiFan purchase with the thing, for house increase something.
sentences.chinese: 晓燕跟一帆采购着东西，为房子里增加些东西。

sentences.english: We want to buy Knitwear and Knitted Fabrics , Shirts , Belts Suspender , Dress Shirts , Neckwear.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购针织物和编织织物，衬衫，腰带。

sentences.english: Purchasing managers in manufacturing firms also report mounting orders.
sentences.chinese: 在制造业公司的采购经理们也报告了订单数的回升。

sentences.english: Supplier must have purchase order number which was provided by Purchasing.
sentences.chinese: 供应商必须持有采购部提供的采购单号。

sentences.english: Supplier must have purchase order number which was provided by Purchasing.
sentences.chinese: 供应商必须持有采购部提供的采购单号。

sentences.english: Take charge of the purchase requests for facility parts and remodeling plan execution.
sentences.chinese: 负责厂务用备件的采购申请及加工计划。

sentences.english: Only the purchasing agents were overstaffed.
sentences.chinese: 只有采购代理出现人员过多的情况。

sentences.english: Car series for consumable sales and procurement.
sentences.chinese: 面向轿车系列易损件的销售与采购。

sentences.english: We want to buy Scarves, Stoles, Pareos and Made-Ups, Shawls.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购围巾，女用坎肩，海滩裙和装扮，披肩。

definition: to order goods/to place an order
to buy on a considerable scale/to purchase/to procure/to stock up
to order goods/to place an order
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
